AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Name: Assign Recurring Gift Add Data Form
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Description: Form to allow user to assign a recurring gift to a sponsorship that has no recurring gift
AddDataFormTemplateSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda

SaveImplementation.common:CreateProcedureSQL:
create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_ASSIGN_RECURRINGGIFT ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CONTEXTID uniqueidentifier, -- SPONSORSHIPID of the sponsorship user is viewing @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @RECURRINGGIFTID uniqueidentifier = null -- recurring gift guid user enters into form ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
begin try -- ensure we have a sponsorship id: if @CONTEXTID is null RAISERROR ('No sponsorship ID was given. Something went wrong, be sure you have a Sponsorship selected.', 16, 1)
declare @CURRENTRECURRINGGIFTID uniqueidentifier select @CURRENTRECURRINGGIFTID = REVENUESPLITID from dbo.SPONSORSHIP where ID = @CONTEXTID
if @CURRENTRECURRINGGIFTID is not null RAISERROR ('The sponsorship is not missing a recurring gift.', 16, 1)
update dbo.SPONSORSHIP set REVENUESPLITID = @RECURRINGGIFTID, DATECHANGED = getdate(), CHANGEDBYID = @CHANGEAGENTID where ID = @CONTEXTID
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
